doc.title: Dai M siu dui
doc.plot: In a universe where monarchy has supreme power, General Lau is summoned to the Prince's throne and is introduced to Lieutenant Ng. After meeting General Lau and briefed on the battle against the rebellion, Lieutenant Ng speaks privately with the Prince, and is ordered to eliminate General Lau if he were to survive from being a sacrifice. This however, was not an easy mission for Lieutenant Ng. For guilt and cowardice constantly haunts Lieutenant Ng, and the struggle to remain loyal to the Prince or his superior was put to the test on the battlefield.
